column3: Windows 11 25H2 assembly 26200.7623  Google chrome Version: 144.0.7559.110 (64 bit)
Sorting products in ascending order displays prices in descending order, and sorting products in descending order displays prices in ascending order

column1: Actual result: Sorting in descending order is applied
Expected result: Sorting in ascending order is applied
Actual result: Sorting in ascending order is applied
Expected result: Sorting in descending order is applied

column3: Filtering the product list: When filtering the price from 0 to 49, the site shows an empty page without an appropriate notification

column1: Actual result: The site displays a page without products, without a notification that there are no products
Expected result: The site displays a corresponding notification about the absence of products

column3: Adding products to the cart: a product with a quantity <=0 is added to the cart

column1: In the product quantity field, select <=0
Actual result: A product with quantity <=0 is added to the cart
Expected result: A product with quantity <=0 is not added to the cart, an error message appears

column3: Viewing the product list: some products are missing an image

column1: Go to the 2nd, 6th, 9th, 10th page of the catalog
Actual result: The image of some products is not displayed
Expected result: The image of some products is correctly displayed on the 2nd, 6th, 9th, 10th page of the online store

column3: Checking authorization: After clicking the login link, the user is not redirected to the login page
column4: Preconditions: the user is not authorized in the system

column1: Click on the tab "Cart", "Payment" or "Order History"
In the message about the need for authorization, click on the link "Log in" [https://intern.demoshopping.ru/]
Actual result: The user remains on the main page. The transition to the Login page does not occur
Expected result: The user is redirected to the login page after clicking on the link
